Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">  
     
    function handler()
    {    
        if (client.readyState == 4 /* complete */) {
            if (client.status == 200) {
              document.write(client.responseText);
            }
        }
    }
      
    var client = new window.XMLHttpRequest();
    client.open("GET", "http://localhost:8080/rest/private/my-service/helloworld/Andrea" , true);  
    client.onreadystatechange = handler;
    client.send();
     
  </script>
